desc:
With Alpha Boot we wanted to reinvent the classic trekking boot but with a much lighter, urban and comfortable sole. All this is due to the implementation of our latest sole: Alpha, with which we have achieved optimal grip, no matter the situation.

In addition, thanks to its waxed microfiber surface, PU and its internal mesh lining, it makes it perfect for winter and the inclemency of your day to day in the city. The future of trekking boots is here.
